data.actual_result: The change nickname button appears and it does literally nothing
data.expected_result: It shouldn't be there, since you can't change nickname of someone that is not in the server.
data.short_description: There is a "Change nickname" button on users/bots in servers they are not even a member in if you right click on them
data.steps_to_repro: - Mention a bot/user and be able to right click on them - Observe the "Change nickname" button
